211-6304.Description:
With deep tourmaline plates, the Toni & Guy deep waver styling iron achieves loose, natural curls and smooth, soft waves effortlessly.  The colour lock tourmaline helps to maintain colour intensity while locking in moisture for a super shiny, frizz-free finish.

Heating to 180?C in 30 seconds, this deep waver styling iron allows you to style quickly and effectively, while 25 heat options allow you to match your hair type and your style.
211-6304.Name: Toni & Guy Deep Barrel Waver

Results.Title: Not very good
Results.ReviewText: I'm definatley taking this back it doesn't wave or curl the hair it just about makes a kink in it. Very disappointed

Results.Title: Works very quickly!
Results.ReviewText: I bought this with a little bit of doubt but now I'm so glad that I did buy it, it does exactly as advertised and is amazing and lasts for at least two days! My hair is thick and just past my waist, however only takes me twenty minutes to get my hair perfect!

Results.Title: Great gift for the Wife
Results.ReviewText: Got this for the Mrs ! It was the right on ha. She was very happy with it. She uses it everyday

Results.Title: Terrible Styler
Results.ReviewText: My dad bought myself this for Christmas, when I used the product it did not create the wave effect. It more so straightened my hair. My hair is naturally straight and I decided it was time for a change, and therefore I bought this product only to be severely disappointed that it did NOT create the style I was looking for. I would not recommend this product to anyone.

Results.Title: Ideal Present
Results.ReviewText: great product and well received as a birthday present.Will be well used in the run up to Christmas

Results.Title: Very good
Results.ReviewText: the toni and guy barrel waver is a very good purchase, it does exactly what it promises to do, and gives and effortless look.

Results.Title: waver
Results.ReviewText: got this for my daughter who likes to curl her hair, it's great , my other daughter who has finer hair uses it and what a difference,m makers her hair look really thick x

Results.Title: Barrel waver
Results.ReviewText: Very easy to use on your own don't need any body to help you .they are avery good product and doesn't take ages to do very good price
